PROMPT.SMARTCARD.DESCRIPTION: Cryptographic smart cards are often used for single sign-on. Most advanced smart cards include specialized cryptographic hardware that uses algorithms such as RSA and DSA. Today's cryptographic smart cards generate key pairs on board, to avoid the risk fr
PROMPT.PINCODE.DESCRIPTION: A keystore is a repository of security certificates, either Certification Authority Certificates or Public key certificates - used for instance in SSL encryption. In application servers, a file with extension jks serves as keystore. The Java JDK maintains
PROMPT.ESEAL.DESCRIPTION: Advanced electronic signature provided by DiSP is compliant with Article 3 (16) of the Provisions on Electronic Documents adopted by the Bureau of the European Parliament on 1 October 2018; and in accordance with Article 3 (26) of the Regulation (EU) No 910/2014 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 23 July 2014 on Electronic Identification and Trust Services for Electronic Transactions in the Internal Market.
PROMPT.QESEAL.DESCRIPTION: Qualified electronic seal provided by DiSP is compliant with Article 3 (17) of the Provisions on Electronic Documents adopted by the Bureau of the European Parliament on 1 October 2018; and in accordance with Article 3 (27) of Regulation (EU) No 910/2014 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 23 July 2014 on Electronic Identification and Trust Services for Electronic Transactions in the Internal Market
PROMPT.ISSUER.NOT.TRUSTED.COMMENT: The issuer of a certificate used for the signature of the document was not in the list of trusted authorities.
PROMPT.CERTIFICATE.REVOKED.COMMENT: The certificate used for signing the document was revoked at the time of signing.
You are about to cancel the request(s). Do you want to continue?
REQUESTS_ACTION_BAR.PROMPT.MULTI-ARCHIVE: You are about to archive the request(s). Do you want to continue?
REQUESTS_ACTION_BAR.REQUEST.SENT.SUCCESS: The request(s) have been sent successfully.
REQUESTS_ACTION_BAR.REQUEST.CANCELED.SUC: The request(s) have been cancelled successfully.
REQUESTS_ACTION_BAR.REQUEST.ARCHIVED.SUC: The request(s) have been archived successfully.
REQUESTS_ACTION_BAR.REQUEST.PURGED.SUCCE: The request(s) have been purged successfully.
REQUESTS_ACTION_BAR.PROMPT.MULTI-PURGE.C: You are about to purge the request(s). Do you want to continue?
You will delete the document from the Digital Signature Portal (DISP) and it will no longer be available for anyone.
This action is irreversible. If you do not want to delete the file click "Cancel".
If you want to save the file on your computer before you delete it from DISP, please use the button "Download".
REQUESTS_ACTION_BAR.PURGE.COMMENT.EMPTY: To delete the file please provide brief instructions (e.g. an external reference) about how the signed file can be found in future, and click the button "Purge".
REQUESTS_TABLE.HEADER.TITLE: Title
REQUESTS_TABLE.SELECTION.PURGED.TOOLTIP: This request has already been purged.
REQUESTS_TABLE.ERROR.SEND.STATUS: The selected requests must be in status 'Draft'. Please correct your selection.
REQUESTS_TABLE.ERROR.CANCEL.STATUS: The selected requests must be in status 'Draft' or 'Sent' or 'Ongoing'. Please correct your selection.
REQUESTS_TABLE.ERROR.ARCHIVE.STATUS: The selected requests must be in status 'Cancelled' or 'Completed' and must not be already archived. Please correct your selection.
REQUESTS_TABLE.ERROR.PURGE.STATUS: The selected requests must be in status 'Cancelled' or 'Completed'. Please correct your selection.
REQUESTS_TABLE.ERROR.SEND.SELECTION: No selection found. Please select one or more requests for send.
REQUESTS_TABLE.ERROR.CANCEL.SELECTION: No selection found. Please select one or more requests for multi-cancel.
REQUESTS_TABLE.ERROR.ARCHIVE.SELECTION: No selection found. Please select one or more requests for multi-archive.
REQUESTS_TABLE.ERROR.PURGE.SELECTION: No selection found. Please select one or more requests for multi-purge.

AUDITING_EVENTS.CRITERIA.ERROR.GREATER_D: «End Date» can't be lower than «Start Date»
